summary: Procurement Analyst with experience in strategic sourcing, supplier management, and global commodity strategy development. Skilled in RFQ/RFP processes, negotiations, contract strategy, and driving cost savings through spend analytics and cross-functional collaboration across operations, purchasing, and logistics.

experience.title: Procurement Analyst
experience.description: Performs strategic sourcing of MRO items for the company's North American manufacturing locations as well as supplier management of the strategic suppliers â€“ spend $70M+. Sourcing functions include contract strategy development, issuance of contract RFQs and RFPs, supplier proposal analysis, negotiations, awards and implementations. Responsible for all supplier performance and the ongoing management of strategic supplier relationships. Creates integrated processes among internal functions (e.g., operations, purchasing and logistics) and outside suppliers. Supports teams in conducting negotiations with financial/bid analysis and developing talent. Assists in the development of the global commodity strategy and the implementation plan to leverage opportunities across sub-commodities and monitors compliance to capture savings. Demonstrates execution and leadership in commodity management, strategic sourcing, portfolio management, Total Cost of Ownership, value chain analysis, supplier relationship management and implementations across the enterprise globally. Analyzes demand for a commodity by completing spend histories and demand forecast, identifying current suppliers, determining procurement involvement, historical contract compliance, and demand segmentation to enable the identification of opportunities. Works collaboratively with Procurement Services peers to prioritize opportunities and allocate resources. Identifies near- and long-term opportunities within the commodity spend portfolio through market and business intelligence and interaction with Resource Units that will add value. Builds clear business cases/value propositions to define opportunities. Develops cascading implementation/transition plans to execute commodity sourcing strategies. Captures lessons learned throughout the execution of the sourcing strategy. Builds procurement knowledge and skills within the team.

experience.title: Utility Technician
experience.description: Blast Furnace laborer for day to day maintenance and operations to support steel making. Coke and Lime laborer assisting in day to day supply of raw materials for the blast furnace operation.

experience.title: Life Insurance Sales Agent
experience.description: Obtained Pennsylvania Insurance License. Established candidates for custom insurance packages, including life and auto insurance.

experience.title: Personal Trainer
experience.description: Created custom training programs for 100+ clients per week. Helped retain customer base and built new client list.
